comments:
When moving folders and/or files in the navigator window UI hangs.

For example when I created a folder in the UI to contain some mbox files (~130)
which I added via a command shell.  I then created another folder from my
project and moved the folder containing the mbox files into this new foler.  The
hang occurs with the dialogue box that says, "Moving"

-Patrick

How did you determine that it was hung vs. that it was just taking a long 
time?  How big are these files?  Whenever you move/copy any file, the local 
history information is copied to the new location.  Presumably you don't have 
much local history for these files.

Was there anything in your .log file that would point to which area this 
operation was hanging in?

Debbie,

Where is the .log file that I should check?

-Patrick


-----------------------------

It is under the .metadata directory:

<workspace>/.metadata/.log

Patrick,
Could you put the data from your .log file in this PR?

Thanks Debbie, I found it.
